Content: (PROJECTOR, not those normal horrible beam pattern eye destroyers) Im wanting to have maybe 1300 lumens or so low beam and not 2000 (twin headlights) so that i dont blind oncoming traffic. so i figure if it gives X lumens at X watts, i could just give it less watts to get less lumens. Would this work, or is it a per bulb thing where one would dim and the other would act erratically

Title: Resistor on an LED retrofit for less lumens?
